name: Hidden Water Puzzle - Find Out
description:
Hidden water puzzle - Find Out is a funny, interesting and addictive game.
A wonderful and challenging game to train your brain!

How to play:
- Tap any bottles to pour water into another bottle.
- The rule is that you can only pour the water into another bottle if both bottles have the same color and the bottle in which you want to pour has enough space.
- Keep pouring colored water among the bottle until each bottle hold a watercolor- Don't worry to get stuck, you can always start the level over at any time with a refill and replay the game.

Features:
- Tap to pour, simple one finger control.
- Fun and addictive game- A great game to kill time and train your brain.
- Thousands of exciting levels.
- Interesting color game for everyone.
